tasks.task: Perform initial scan to identify the type of military map (battle map, campaign map, strategic overview, tactical detail, etc.).
Locate and transcribe the map legend/key if present, documenting all symbol definitions.
Identify map metadata: title, date, scale, orientation, source/author if visible.
Extract all geographic and place names visible on the map.
Document all military unit positions, identifying unit types and affiliations where possible.
Trace and describe all movement arrows, noting direction, type of movement, and associated units.
Identify all defensive positions, fortifications, and prepared positions.
Analyze terrain features and their tactical significance.
Extract temporal information showing battle phases or progression.
Document any logistical elements (supply routes, depots, communication lines).
Note color coding schemes and their apparent meanings.
Identify the historical context: specific battle, campaign, war, and approximate date.
Capture any annotations, notes, or explanatory text on the map.
If no war/battle map content is found, respond with the not_found_response as specified.
